item.title: Career
item.description: Career Anything else want to talk hello@itsmoneo.com Teamplay is at the heart of what we do. Who is behind Moneo? Moneo is an idea that consists of people. We are doers, enablers, problem solvers, approachers, disrupters, stargazers, communicators, developers, dreamers, future shapers, and leaders... What does Moneo do? We develop, apply, maintain, scale, test, implement, research and execute... See the job openings and seize the opportunity to be one of us.

item.title: Company
item.description: We are Moneo We cooperate and consolidate with you to establish future-proof digital products. Our Story With its many years of combined professional experience on web and mobile development, Moneo has been around for the better part of 2010’s. Team members have been in the digital arena as doers, enablers, problem solvers and leaders. Our expertise in cloud platforms, startup ecosystem, software development, B2B needfinding, payment structures and e-commerce integrations promise you a frictionless sytem from the ground up.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact us Mail Us Talk anything that you want hello@moneo.com Our Office Drink a coffee? Esentepe Mahallesi Talatpaşa Cad. No:5 34394 Şişli / İstanbul Show on Map Phone Let's talk +90 212 951 09 92 Let's talk! Let us use our unique expertise and renowned talents for your product or business. Tell us briefly about your idea and we make sure to get back to you real soon.

item.title: Services
item.description: Services Back-End Development About Our Service Your business deserves to be handled nothing less than perfectly. Exceptional engineering practices, business oriented solution providing, customer tailored infrastructural and software improvements and industry-wide expertise is what makes Moneo a reliable and stable back-end partner for your organization. We Love Scalable Architecture, SOLID Development, Test-Driven Development, RESTful API design Front-End

item.title: Technologies
item.description: Technologies Technical integrity all the way. From ground up. Businesses deserve to be handled flawlessly. Exceptional engineering practices of Moneo provides you with tailored back-end solutions that are globally reliable and stable. PHP Node.js Go Laravel Symfony Software Craftmanship. Functionality at its best. The product or the business; either of the shines at first sight. Businesses and products alike deserve the best software craftsmanship and the highest quality of code.

item.title: Smart Bundling: How To Serve Legacy Code Only To Legacy Browsers
item.description: While effective bundling of resources on the web has received a great deal of mindshare in recent times, how we ship front-end resources to our users has remained pretty much the same. The average weight of JavaScript and style resources that a website ships with is rising — even though build tooling to optimize the website has never been better. With the marketshare of evergreen browsers rising fast and browsers launching support for new features in lockstep, is it time we rethink asset delivery for the modern web?
